description: The Russian opposition figure is off ventilation and continues to improve, his Berlin hospital says.
title: Alexei Navalny: Poisoned Russian opposition figure 'able to leave bed'
title_page: Alexei Navalny: Poisoned Russian opposition figure 'able to leave bed' - BBC News
maintext: Mr Navalny's supporters believe his tea was spiked at Tomsk airport on 20 August. He became ill during the flight, and the plane made an emergency landing in Omsk. Russian officials were persuaded to allow him to be airlifted to Germany two days later.
